Data¶

Learning from Data Beyond Financial Services



Data insights are critical within a wide range of sectors including the cybersecurity, healthcare & medicine, energy, space weather, and various areas of the public and third sectors. Sometimes the organisations within these sectors

  • Are in search of similar insights or intelligence, e.g., cybersecurity intelligence that continuously outlines the resilience of their computer and software systems to attack.
  • Develop models, e.g., models that aid product or service improvement aims, that depend on data sets that might have similarities with the data sets that a financial firm might use to inform investment options.
  • Might use similar artificial intelligence/data science/machine learning techniques, and techniques from the areas of signal processing, management science, etc., to learn from data.
